title: During the next Communion Phase, Hero models resurrect:
text:
- y Adjacent to their Effigy.

- y With -5 health points from their maximum (the lost health can be healed back to maximum by normal means during activation).

- y With -1AP for their first Activation Phase after resurrecting.

Heroes and Monsters do not incur any permanent effects as a result of dying.

The area marked around Ista's Effigy is where her Champions are able to resurrect after death.
